thread.title: Jenn Cohen

author: Jenn Cohen
title: Jenn Cohen
text: I contacted Template Monster for help with my site. Crystal was absolutely AMAZING!! She was so patient and solved all of my problems with patience and was very thorough. I learned through the process and my site is now displaying exactly as I had hoped! She is an asset to the company and I hope for her assistance should I need assistance in the future!! :D
